x_algo.core: Maximize dwell time & quality engagement. Early momentum (30-60min) + recency + relevance = reach.

good.content: Value, insight, bold takes, niche depth, positive tone, original.
good.format: Video > image > long text/thread/article, strong hook, polls/questions.
good.engage: Reply fast & deep (replies = 27-150x boost), engage peers, 72h+ break = 2-3x temp boost.
good.timing: 8-11am or 5-7pm EST, Tue/Wed/Fri best, 3-5 posts/day spaced.
good.account: Premium+, good fwer/fwing ratio, high TweepCred, consistent niche.

bad.format: External links in main tweet, >3 hashtags, tag spam, long threads (use article).
bad.engage: Post-and-ghost, bot farms, emoji-only replies, engagement pods.
bad.timing: Burst posting then silence, off-peak without audience.
bad.account: High blocks/reports, bad ratio, automation, frequent short breaks.

x_algo.ranking_weights: Dwell time (22x like) > reply > bookmark/repost > like > click.
x_algo.2025_notes: Grok-powered recs, reply deboost fixed, video priority, open-sourced bi-weekly.
